source_objects.title: Media
source_objects.description: Master new forms of publishing from e-books to kindle publishing or writing blogs.

items.title: Self Publishing Made Easy: Amazon Kindle, CreateSpace & Lulu
items.headline: Self-Publishing Step-By-Step Guide To Amazon Kindle, CreateSpace, Lulu Print-On-Demand | Self Publishing Books & eBooks
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn how to write a book or ebook, how to find a niche topic to write about, how to create your own professional looking book or ebook cover, how to create book titles that get more sales, and how to market your book to boost sales and exposure, and how to make money off of the back of your books

By the end of the course, you will be able to write your own books and ebooks and know how to publish them using Lulu Publishing and Amazon CreateSpace's 'Print On Demand' services, and Amazon's 'Kindle Direct Publishing' service. Hopefully you will also have written and published a book or ebook which will be for sale to the public.

items.title: Advanced Tactics on Creating Newsletters For Your Business

visible_instructors.name: Rick Ostler
visible_instructors.title: Rick Ostler Ostler
visible_instructors.job_title: Consulting to entrepreneurs and small businesses

items.headline: Learn how to create simple newsletters for your business or clients. Watch over my shoulder, how I do it, step by step.
objectives_summary: How To Create A Newsletter Your Prospects Cannot Wait To Open Their Email or As Soon As It Comes!
Come with me on a journey as you learn exactly how to get more repeat business, more referrals, have endless amount of new prospects, customers, clients or patients seeking you out!

You’ll be able to build a targeted group of “members”…not just customers.   Because when you become a member of something, creates an amazing powerful psychological trigger that tells people that they’re on the “inside.”  This builds incredible value of your product, service or event and will enable you to charge higher prices and attract superior customers.

objectives_summary: Create a Business Social Media Website with the free software Wordpress
Write Social Media Press Release on new products, CEO messages etc
Integrate Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, Scribd(PDF) and so on into your website

items.title: Romancing Your Novel

visible_instructors.title: Peggy Bechko
visible_instructors.name: Peggy
visible_instructors.job_title: Many Times Published Author and Optioned Screenwriter

items.headline: Have fun learning Romance Writing and take your idea from idle to finish.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you'll have a lot of great background on writing romance novels and if you follow the assignment will be well into creating your novel.
In this course you'll learn about character and development, conflict and how it affects character and the basics for starting that Romance Novel or continuing one you've already begun.
